testingStandards: Fire cert for reupholstered furniture: Often requires re-testing
documentation: RISE Fire Research: Multiple locations (Stockholm, Borås, Lund)
Fire Coverage: EN 1021-1 minimum for upholstered furniture
Non-compliance (fails fire test at site): Replace with certified item
Reused fire doors: Strict; usually requires original EI₂ 30 cert

certificationProcess: BVB non-rated materials: Often flags for review

templates: Missing documentation: Obtain from supplier or test
